Description:
a GUI client for amazon glacier ,

HomeWiki:
Amazon Glacier GUI

a GUI client for amazon glacier ,
Written in .NET 4, C#,WPF,MVVM & RavenDB for storage

Features

* Pause / start jobs.. jobs can be resumed ..
* Jobs are stored in a database , so we can close the app & come back resume jobs
